footer.techs: Powerd by WebRTC and other awesome Web technologies. NO data gets stored as a file on ANY server.

settingsDialog.title: Settings
settingsDialog.helper: The configuration you type here will be stored but not utilized.

error.headline: Error saving configuration
error.description: The format of your configuration is incorrect, thus not loaded. Error message:

StartView.title: Start
StartView.description: Toggle the options to your needs and start sharing your media stream.

invalidRoomIDParam.description: The Room ID given in your URL is invalid. Please check whether the share link is correctly pasted.
invalidRoomIDParam.headline: Invalid URL

messages.turnNodeError: Failed to request TURN / STUN node: You may not be able to connect between NAT-restricted networks.
messages.screenShareError: Failed to request for the video stream. Please check whether the privacy preferences of your browser has led to this.
messages.screenShareNotSupported: Failed to requst for the video stream. It seems that screen sharing is not supported by your browser.

description.master: You may create a room and share your local video stream with others.
description.slave: You may join others' rooms and watch their video streams.

hint.master: Your Room ID is copied. Send the ID or the URL to your partner.
hint.slave: Please wait patiently as we are looking for your partner on the Internet.
